issue.title: [Release][Dev] Add flag to archery release curate to only show minimal information
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16663](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16663). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently archery release curate shows a lot of information that is not relevant, like the tickets that are correctly assigned. Have a new flag to show only the information that requires manual fixing.
